results.title: Beetlejuice
results.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
results.overview: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

results.title: The Cotton Club
results.actors: Richard Gere, Gregory Hines, Diane Lane, Lonette McKee
results.overview: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
results.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

results.title: Crocodile Dundee
results.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
results.overview: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

results.title: Valkyrie
results.actors: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson
results.overview: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

results.title: Ratatouille
results.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
results.overview: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

results.title: City of God
results.actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
results.overview: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

results.title: The Intouchables
results.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
results.overview: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

results.title: Stardust
results.actors: Ian McKellen, Bimbo Hart, Alastair MacIntosh, David Kelly
results.overview: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

results.title: Apocalypto
results.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead
results.overview: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

results.title: Taxi Driver
results.actors: Diahnne Abbott, Frank Adu, Victor Argo, Gino Ardito
results.overview: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

results.title: No Country for Old Men
results.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
results.overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

results.title: Looper
results.actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano
results.overview: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

results.title: The Beach
results.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon, Virginie Ledoyen
results.overview: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

results.title: Scarface
results.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
results.overview: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

results.title: Inception
results.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
results.overview: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

results.title: The Deer Hunter
results.actors: Robert De Niro, John Cazale, John Savage, Christopher Walken
results.overview: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

results.title: Chasing Amy
results.actors: Ethan Suplee, Ben Affleck, Scott Mosier, Jason Lee
results.overview: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.

results.title: Django Unchained
results.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
results.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

results.title: Snatch
results.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Vinnie Jones, Brad Pitt
results.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

results.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
results.actors: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
results.overview: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

results.title: The Hangover
results.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha
results.overview: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

Based on Frank Miller's graphic novel, 300 is very loosely based the 480 B.C. Battle of Thermopylae, where the King of Sparta led his army against the advancing Persians; the battle is said to have inspired all of Greece to band together against the Persians, and helped usher in the world's first democracy.

results.title: Top Gun: Maverick
results.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.

results.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
results.overview: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

results.title: Rambo
results.overview: When governments fail to act on behalf of captive missionaries, ex-Green Beret John James Rambo sets aside his peaceful existence along the Salween River in a war-torn region of Thailand to take action.  Although he's still haunted by violent memories of his time as a U.S. soldier during the Vietnam War, Rambo can hardly turn his back on the aid workers who so desperately need his help.
